title: Goodyear 4PC Microfibre Cloth Set- microfibre cloths for cleaning your vehicle | Cleaning fibres attract dust | Showroom finish | Machine washable | Dashboard, Buffing, Window cloth | Wash and drying
features: Advanced Microfiber Technology: These specially designed microfiber cloths are engineered to provide superior cleaning power. The statically charged cleaning fibers attract and hold dust, dirt, and debris more effectively than traditional cloths, ensuring a thorough and efficient clean for your vehicle.

Versatile Cloth Set: This set includes four types of cloths tailored for specific cleaning tasks: a dashboard cloth for interior surfaces, a buffing cloth for polishing and shine, a window cloth for streak-free glass cleaning, and a wash & dry cloth for general use. Each cloth is designed to optimize cleaning results.

Generous Size: Goodyear 4PC Microfibre Cloth Set measuring 40cm x 30cm, these cloths offer ample surface area for efficient cleaning. The size ensures that you can cover more area with each cloth, making your cleaning tasks quicker and more effective.

Superior Dirt Absorption: Microfibers are known for their superior dirt absorption capabilities compared to regular cloths. These cloths can hold more dirt and grime, reducing the need for frequent cleaning and making them highly efficient for vehicle maintenance.

Enjoy easy maintenance with these machine washable microfiber cloths. They retain their effectiveness and durability even after multiple washes, making them a practical and cost-effective choice for ongoing vehicle care. The high-quality fibers provide a streak-free, glossy finish, enhancing the appearance of both interior and exterior surfaces.
description: The Goodyear Microfiber Cloth Set is specially designed for superior vehicle cleaning, featuring statically charged cleaning fibers that attract and hold dust and dirt more effectively than traditional cloths. Each cloth in this 4-piece set—Dashboard Cloth, Buffing Cloth, Window Cloth, and Wash and Dry Cloth—measures 40cm x 30cm and is tailored for specific cleaning tasks, ensuring a showroom finish every time. The advanced microfiber technology used in these cloths provides a high level of dirt attraction and absorption, making them ideal for achieving a spotless, streak-free look on your vehicle. The Dashboard Cloth gently cleans interior surfaces without scratching, while the Buffing Cloth is perfect for polishing and adding a high gloss. The Window Cloth ensures a clear, streak-free shine on glass surfaces, and the Wash and Dry Cloth is versatile for various cleaning and drying tasks. All cloths are machine washable, retaining their effectiveness and durability even after repeated use. This set combines convenience with professional-grade results, making it an essential addition to your vehicle care routine. Designed for hassle-free use, these microfiber cloths are easy to care for. They are quick-drying and retain their shape and cleaning properties after each wash, making them a reliable and practical choice for regular vehicle maintenance. Goodyear is renowned for its commitment to quality and performance. With this microfiber cloth set, you can trust that you're investing in a product that meets the highest standards and delivers excellent cleaning results.
